WorkflowInfo.Name: Switch to standby
WorkflowInfo.Description: Switch to standby list of workstations and create a report
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:MemorySet;Assembly=MemorySet, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ReadXLS;Assembly=ReadXLS, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetDate;Assembly=GetDate, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:WriteFile;Assembly=WriteFile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:WMI;Assembly=WMI, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:Contains;Assembly=Contains, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns10="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns11="clr-namespace:ServerStandby;Assembly=ServerStandby, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns12="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" VariableValue=" " DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="False" VariableName="STBY_Report" x:Name="memorySet1" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /> <ns1:ReadXLS IsValid="True" x:Name="readXLS1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Read Excel" Path="c:\ServersList.xls" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Read excel file" HostId="1" TypeName="ReadXLS" UserName="" /> <ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns6:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount2%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns7:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns8:WMI IsValid="True" x:Name="Check_Screen_Saver" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" Query="select * from Win32_Process" TypeName="WMI" DisplayName="WMI Query" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="WMI Query" HostId="-2" WmiNamespace="root\CIMV2" UserName="" /> <ns9:Contains IsValid="True" x:Name="contains1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TheValue="%Check_Screen_Saver%" DisplayName="Contains" Description="Returns true if sting contains search phrase." TheValue2=".scr" TypeName="Contains" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="CheckScreenSaverStatus"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="Running"> <ns10:ReturnValue Value="True" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,True)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns11:ServerStandby IsValid="True" x:Name="serverStandby1" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="%ServerName%" DisplayName="Server Standby" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Puts the selected server in standby mode." HostId="-2" TypeName="ServerStandby" UserName="" /> <ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" VariableValue="%ServerName% has been switched to stby" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="True" VariableName="STBY_Report" x:Name="memorySet2" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="NotRunning"> <ns10:ReturnValue Value="False" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,False)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns12:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> <ns3:GetDate IsValid="True" x:Name="getDate1" TimeInterval="Seconds" FuturePast="0" DateFormat="MM_dd_yyyy_HH_mm" TypeName="GetDate" DisplayName="Get Date" TimeZone="120" TimeZoneIDS="Israel Standard Time" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Returns the date in the specified format." TimeZoneName="(UTC+02:00) Jerusalem" TimeZoneIsInDaylightSavingTime="False" TimeToAdd="0" /> <ns4:WriteFile IsValid="True" x:Name="writeFile1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" NewValue="%STBY_Report%" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Write File" Path="c:\STBY_Report_%getDate1%.txt" IsAppend="False" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Write text to a file" HostId="1" TypeName="WriteFile" UserName="" /> <ns5:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Workstations StandBy Report" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="c:\STBY_Report_%getDate1%.txt" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 11.00.9600.16476"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">%STBY_Report% </BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process retrieves a list of workstations from an Excel file or a memory table and checks if a screen saver process is running (to check if someone is working at the moment). In case there is a screensaver running, a switch to stand-by process is performed.
